[b][color=white]Notifications To Be Implemented[/color][/b] 
[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5675353][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] has announced that he intends to implement notifcations properly onto the site. Giving credit to [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5674610]this[/url] thread for realizing the change needed to happen, [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5675353][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] has already laying out a plan to see this much wanted feature into fruition.[size=small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5675353]>>source[/url][/size]

[b][color=white]From Zero to Hero[/color][/b] 
The gates of the marketplace have finally been opened to newly opened accounts after [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5675353][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] reduced the required reputation to post fromone to zero. Many can expect threads from newly opened accounts on the matter to significantly be reduced. [size=small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5675443]>>source[/url][/size]

[b][color=white]A New Smile For Your Profile[/color][/b] 
With all the attempts to modernize Hack Forums, [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5675353][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] has seen fit to remove several rules in regards to profile policies. The rules that have been removed are the following:
[list]
[*]3. No religious, nationality, or political expression in your profile.
[*]5. No image rotation or scripts images (ip grabber) for your avatar or signature.
[*]11. No advertising of NFA (Non-Free Account) threads, sales, or services in your profile.
[/list][size=small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5675449]>>source[/url][/size]

[b][color=white]Post to PM[/color][/b] 
[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5675353][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] has removed the rule dissallowing users to require a post before the item or service was sent via private message. [size=small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5675446]>>source[/url][/size]

[b][color=white]It Seems There Are Memes[/color][/b]
A new section has been added, [color=#FFFFFF][i]Meme Shit Meme[/i][/color], or the MSM section with the sole purpose of [i]meme-ing[/i]. The section requires all threads to be meme oriented with anything else being closed or junked. [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5675353][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] has already stated that rules such as low-quality-posting (LQP) do not apply in the section. [size=small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5675385]>>source[/url][/size]

[list][b][color=white][u]Announcement Threads[/u][/color][/b]


[list][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5671360][b]"RKO Done"[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#FF66FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url]
Omniscient have just announced the removal of the "RKO" plugin and usage on this forum.[/list]


[list][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5673293][b]"L33T + API = AWESOME"[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#FF66FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url]
Omniscient have just enabled HF API v1 access for L33T, UB3R, and R3KT members. He states that this should greatly encourage the usage of the API to further incorporate and inspire app development.[/list]
[/list]

[hr]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/bJ1zL7c.gif[/img]
[color=1E90FF][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]Interview[/font][/size][/color] [color=white][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]-[/font][/size][/color] [size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3129680] Riyu'[/url][/font][/size][spoiler=][align=left]

[hr]

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2177496][color=#00AAFF][b]bοxxy[/b][/color][/url]: Hello, and welcome to the 353rd edition of the HF News. Before we begin, would you like to make any shoutouts?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3129680][color=#FFFFFF][b] Riyu'[/b][/color][/url]: I'd like to shout out Vyrez and all the members of Revolution.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2177496][color=#00AAFF][b]bοxxy[/b][/color][/url]: Excellent. HF is a big community, but it had to start somewhere. How did you manage to stumble across the community?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3129680][color=#FFFFFF][b] Riyu'[/b][/color][/url]: I used host modded lobbies on Xbox and I came across the user "Omoi". He told me I could make some money by signing up and hosting lobbies for people. I stayed on the forum after his closure due to the amount of money that could be made here.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2177496][color=#00AAFF][b]bοxxy[/b][/color][/url]: Very nice, assuming that you did indeed make money. During your time here, what other marketplace activities have you gotten involved in?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3129680][color=#FFFFFF][b] Riyu'[/b][/color][/url]: At first, I wasn't really active in the marketplace due to me liking being inside group subforums and just talking in the lounge. I joined some Hack Forums skype group and I was told that selling eBooks was the way to be successful on here. I attempted selling at first and it never worked out so I ventured out into selling Playstation gift card and that was very successful for me. After my 6 month ban, I decided to give eBooks another try and it's working out great so far.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2177496][color=#00AAFF][b]bοxxy[/b][/color][/url]: Glad to hear things turned around for you a bit here. Aside from the marketplace and your lounge adventures, what makes you log into Hack Forums when you do?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3129680][color=#FFFFFF][b] Riyu'[/b][/color][/url]: I just like logging in and seeing members experience different things. I'm active in pretty much every section and I love learning about new things as well. When I first joined, I have no idea what bitcoin was or even how to use a wallet. I've also learned how to manage my money a lot better as well. Members here have been very helpful to me.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2177496][color=#00AAFF][b]bοxxy[/b][/color][/url]: I can see that. Joined in 2016, with over 1,400 reputation, and 11,000 posts.  How do you manage, and what are most of your posts about?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3129680][color=#FFFFFF][b] Riyu'[/b][/color][/url]: A lot of my posts were in all honesty shit posts inside The Order subforum. I spent a lot of time there as they accepted me my first day on the forum. I've spent a lot of time here but I've had only enjoyable moments so far.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2177496][color=#00AAFF][b]bοxxy[/b][/color][/url]: I've been in The Order so that makes more sense now to me. Going to change the pace a little; aside from Hack Forums, what do you do outside of the internet world?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3129680][color=#FFFFFF][b] Riyu'[/b][/color][/url]: I started College back in September and it's been going great. While I was banned I started working at my family's real estate office accepting calls and  scheduling appointments. It was nice for awhile but I decided to leave it as I will be starting school again.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2177496][color=#00AAFF][b]bοxxy[/b][/color][/url]: I've noticed quite a few members are attending college.  What are you studying/what plans do you have for your future?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3129680][color=#FFFFFF][b] Riyu'[/b][/color][/url]: I'm currently pursuing a major in Criminal Justice. I think it will be a good fit for me as well.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2177496][color=#00AAFF][b]bοxxy[/b][/color][/url]: That's pretty neat, I wish you the best of luck.  Alright a few more things before we wrap this one up. You're pretty active, and in saying that there have probably been plenty of both good and bad experiences here on Hack Forums. Would you change anything if you could, and if so what would you change?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3129680][color=#FFFFFF][b] Riyu'[/b][/color][/url]: Everything has been pretty positive so far, the only thing I'd change would probably be the gaming section. I love gaming and most of the sections are dead or just outdated. There's some other stuff like dealing with scammers but any online marketplace will have those and it's hard to stop them.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2177496][color=#00AAFF][b]bοxxy[/b][/color][/url]: I understand what you mean. Is there anything else you'd like to add before we finish the interview?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3129680][color=#FFFFFF][b] Riyu'[/b][/color][/url]: No that's all, thank you for having me.

[/align][/spoiler][/align]

[hr]
posts.subject: Hack Forums News // Edition 353

posts.message:
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=1][color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/2-303.png[/img][/align]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/SupportHFN.png[/img][/align]

[align=center]We publish the HF News every week yet we have aged members who don't even know we exist! Wear any of the signatures listed below to support us and spread the word about HF News, HF Wiki, and Writers altogether. 

[color=white][spoiler=[b]Support Signatures[/b]]

[color=white][b]-1-[/b][/color]
[url=http://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/KTCFZt0.gif[/img][/url]
[code][align=center][url=http://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/KTCFZt0.gif[/img][/url][/align][/code]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/Memo.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Freelance Journalists?[/color][/b]
Got an idea for a section in the news that you want to do? Think it'll bring a lot of attention to it? I'm going to give this idea a shot and see how it plays out. PM me with a GOOD idea (Forbidden: Anime News) and I'll consider it. What you get in return is your own section in the news and [i]possibly[/i] group access. All depends on how active you are. If you submit your section once a month, chances are you won't be added to Writ3rs.. Oh! Get creative, no limits. Think of stuff that isn't generic (Gaming, Tech, blah blah boring...). Ok. Thanks. Bye.

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/H5MRIbN.png[/img][/align]
[b][color=white]Newly Discovered Exoplanet is 'Hotter Than Most Stars'[/color][/b] 
An exoplanet is a planet out of our solar system that also orbits a star. This particular planet was discovered by NASA's own Kepler space telescope team and is certainly unique in its own right. KELT-9b, as it has been named, is 650 light-years from us on Earth and is a member of the constellation Cygnus. The exoplanet is unique for a number of reasons, one of which is that it is close to twice the size of Jupiter. It also has a daytime temperature close to that of a star, as the title would suggest. Lastly, the planet orbits its own star once for every 1.5 Earth day. You may be wondering why exactly it is so hot on this planet. It is that the star KELT-9b orbits is about twice the size as our Sun. This makes KELT-9b the owner of the hottest star of an exoplanet that we have ever seen. Pretty crazy when you stop and think about it. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.cnn.com/2017/06/05/world/hottest-giant-exoplanet-discovery/index.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Brains are More Plastic Than we Thought[/color][/b] 
Scientists at the Montreal Neurological Institute and Hospital of McGill University have made an extremely intriguing discovery, certain parts of the brain can be repurposed to perform different tasks. At first, this may not sound all that interesting to you, however, think about those that have suffered brain damage for one reason or another. The example given by the researchers are those that have lost certain functions due to suffering strokes, and they have experimented in an effort to prove it. The author or the paper, Christopher Pack, has said the following about the discovery "Individual parts of the cortex are exquisitely sensitive to specific visual features -- colors, lines, shapes, motion -- so it's exciting that we might be able to build this knowledge into protocols that aim to increase or decrease the involvement of different brain regions in conscious visual perception, according to the needs of the subject. This is something we're starting to work on now." [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2017/07/170719113304.htm]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Dog Domestication Happened Just Once, Ancient DNA Study Suggests[/color][/b] 
According to newly uncovered evidence, it may have only taken once for man and canine to become best friends forever. The new data gives us the impression that dogs and wolves became distinct from one another approximately 20,000 to 40,000 years ago. From that point, they split between eastern and western groups which we think was between 17,000 to 24,000 years ago. That is where the splits stop which gives the researchers their current conclusion. Perhaps man and dog were destined to be together. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.sciencenews.org/article/dog-domestication-happened-just-once-ancient-dna-study-suggests]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/vBnTpNT.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Shooting at the Israeli Embassy in Jordan[/color][/b] 
Two have been left dead and one more injured at a shooting in Israeli's embassy based in Jordan. Very few details have been released with information regarding the shooting, but police say two Jordanians working for a furniture firm entered the embassy right before the shooting accord. Israeli authorities are not reporting on the incident and have imposed a reporting restriction. Security forces have sealed off the embassy, and Israeli authorities have evacuated staff. Some reports are saying this is possible retaliation to the Israel enforced installation to metal detectors at a site sacred to both Muslims and Jews in East Jerusalem. Thousands of Jordanians protested against the installation in Amman and extra security cameras have also been installed in some locations increasing the tensions between not only religions but between Israelis and Palestinians. The added security was added after two Israeli policemen were killed. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-middle-east-40700467]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Donald Trump's Lawyer Rebuffs Claims of a 'Self-Pardon'[/color][/b] 
A lawyer for Donald Trump has said that his legal team is not looking for a way for the US President to self-pardon himself. Reports this week suspected Mr. Trump was attempting to try to pardon himself after a rocky start to the presidency. Mr. Trump himself said that he had "complete power" to issue pardons, after supposedly asking his advisers about how much authority he had. The reports are also connected to recent claims that the Russia interfered in the US election, with Mr. Trump's own son being mixed in the fray. Mr. Trump also released a tweet on the claims, saying "While all agree the U. S. President has the complete power to pardon, why think of that when only crime so far is LEAKS against us. FAKE NEWS." Some US intelligence agencies think Russia tried to help Mr. Trump to power, but both himself and Russia deny this claims despite recent links and meetings had between both of them before the election results. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-40699441]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Turkish Newspaper Journalists Face Trial for Terrorism[/color][/b] 
Cumhuriyet journalists were a Turkish opposition newspaper but have become the story themselves, as 17 of their journalists face trials for possibly aiding a terrorist organization. If they are found guilty, they could all face up to 43 years in jail. Ten of the Cumhuriyet journalists have already been imprisoned for almost nine months while they await trial. Daughter of the journalist Turhan Gunay is extremely upset and has been quoted saying: "I cannot touch him. I cannot hug him. We talk over the phone behind a glass. When the time is up, they cut the line. It is so frustrating to be taken away from him every week." Elif Gunay is only allowed to see her 71-year-old father once a week and only for an hour. May activist rights groups are enraged in Turkey. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-europe-40699368]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]    [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/Jvg81mQ.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Nokia 8 Spotted on Official Site[/color][/b]
As the official launch of Nokia's flagship smartphone - Nokia 8 is moving closer - more data about the soon to be launched handset has begun flying up on the web. While the cell phone has just been leaked numerous times in a previous couple of weeks, this time it is spotted on the official website of Nokia in China. 
Hearsay, Nokia 8 will run Android 7.1.1 Nougat out-of-the-box. The cell phone, which could be launched on July 31, as of late showed up on Geekbench mobile benchmarking site, uncovering some of its key determinations. The reference posting proposes that the Nokia 8 will don a 5.3-inch QHD screen. It could be powered by Qualcomm's leader Snapdragon 835 processor, clubbed with 4GB/6GB RAM. The dual camera setup is required to have two 13MP sensors. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.gadgetsnow.com/tech-news/nokia-8-spotted-on-official-site/articleshow/59687188.cms]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Google Glass Gets a Second Chance in Factories[/color][/b]
Google Glass, the savvy head-up display, and camera that should turn into everybody's next compact PC are not dead. It has landed a position — various jobs, in fact. The second cycle of Google Glass has been tried and sent crosswise over numerous production lines in the United States by organizations, for example, Boeing, GE, and DHL. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/2017/7/18/15988258/google-glass-2-enterprise-edition-factories]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Samsung May be Making its Own AirPod[/color][/b]
Samsung might be making AirPod-like earphones controlled by its brilliant, smart assistant Bixby that could launch close by the Galaxy Note 8 one month from now, as per a report from Etnews. The earphones will purportedly highlight clamor-canceling as well, the report says. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/circuitbreaker/2017/7/21/16011864/samsung-bixby-powered-wireless-headphones-report]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]      [/color]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/GamingNews/Tsundere.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]First Screenshots of Dragon Ball FighterZ's Newest Characters Piccolo and Krillin[/color][/b] 
Recently two more playable characters have been announced for the upcoming Dragon Ball game, Dragon Ball FighterZ. Earlier in the week, Bandai Namco had released pictures of Piccolo and Krillin who are now confirmed to be in the Dragon Ball FighterZ roster. At the moment there is a total of 9 characters known to the public that will be featured in the game. The list consists of Goku, Vegeta, Gohan, Frieza, Cell, Majin Buu, Future Trunks, Piccolo, and Krillin. Lucky news for those wanting to try out the game early. There will be an early beta for those who own an Xbox One or PS4. It is an open public beta, so you do not need to worry about pre-ordering the game as some require you to do. All you need to do is register July 26! You can pick up the full game in 2018 and in addition to the consoles, it will be available on the PC too. Rumors for the release of a Switch version of the game are also in the air of discussion. However, Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 will be coming to the Switch in September. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/first-screenshots-of-dragon-ball-fighterzs-newest-/1100-6451884/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Four More Pokemon Sun and Moon Mega Stones Available Now[/color][/b] 
Again, Nintendo is releasing some more mega stones to add to your collection. For a limited time, you will be able to obtain a mega stone for Tyranitar, Abomasnow, Manectric, and Aggron. In order to get these stones, you will need a password. First, you will want to go to the Mystery Gift option right before you load your save of your Sun and Moon game. Next, you will select gift "via Code/Password".  Here is where the code will come in. The code for the stones is "SABLEVOLANT". Lastly, here comes the easy part. Once you submit the code and it successfully redeems it, you will want to proceed to any PokeCenter and visit the delivery man that has a package with your four new stones! That is not all. If you did not have a chance to read the last Pokemon article in the Gaming News section of the Hack Forums News, Nintendo is still giving away the Shiny Tapu Koko from the Mystery Gift option as well! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/four-more-pokemon-sun-and-moon-mega-stones-availab/1100-6451881/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Destiny 2 Beta Is Now Open To Everyone On PS4, Xbox One[/color][/b] 
By the time you are reading this, the Beta has most likely ended. If you had the chance to play it, did you enjoy it? At first, you need to pre-order the game to get early access to the beta. If you owned a PS4 and pre-ordered that version of the game, you had access to the beta July 18, The next day, July 19; the beta was opened up for those who pre-ordered on the Xbox One. Until July 20, those with the early beta access were able to play Campaign, Cooperative, and Competitive matches in a much more peaceful atmosphere. That being said, these players had the early advantage for those who did not have access to the beta. On July 21, the beta became open to everyone (Xbox and PlayStation). Sadly the PC players were shown no love, but no worries, the beta for the PC version of the game will be open sometime in August. In its current state, the beta offered only one multiplayer map, the first opening mission of the campaign, and some strikes. The official game will be releasing this September for the Xbox and PlayStation. The release of the PC version of the game comes out in October. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/destiny-2-beta-is-now-open-to-everyone-on-ps4-xbox/1100-6451879/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Playerunknown's Battlegrounds Player Banned for Team-Killing a Team-Killer[/color][/b] 
Popular Twitch streamer by the name of DrDisrespect was temporarily banned from Playerunknown's Battlegrounds recently after killing one of his teammates. Playerunknown's Battlegrounds or PUBG for short is currently one of the most popular MMOBRV (multiplayer online battle royal video game) of 2016-2017.  This ban goes to show that even if you are a popular streamer, it does not give you a special privilege in some games. DrDisrespect had decided to team kill a random player that was assigned to his squad. Dr. and his friends had no idea who this player was, and soon it came to a point where they all needed to get into a vehicle, but it did not have enough room for all the players of the squad (four in total). So, Dr. decided to kill the random teammate early on in the game. The clip of Dr. killing the random teammate was recorded on his stream, as well as one of the friends he was playing with. Playerunknown tweeted out, "If you break the rules in PUBattlegrounds, no matter who you are, you're gonna have a bad time!" When you queue up for a "squad" game, you have the chance to team up with random players if you do not have a full squad which mostly consists of three to four players. On Reddit, a player by the name of sxk7 says that they joined a game with a friend with the auto-matchmaking feature on. After that, once in the game the random players they got into the game went rogue and decided to try and kill sxk7 and their friend. Sxk7 was fed up with the act and wanted to assist his friend who was being killed by the rogue teammate. After doing so, sxk7 ended up being banned himself, and he felt like the wrong action was taken to his account. sxk7 provided video proof of what went down, and he was unbanned. Sadly if you disconnect in the game you are not able to join back in the session you were just in. So with that being said, if you are with a friend and they happen to disconnect, you are eligible to kill them and loot their gear. However, if you decided to kill them for the heck of it or to be that one dude trolling, you can be reported and banned for "malicious team killing."  A tweet which can be seen [url=https://twitter.com/Its_vPanda/status/887568229434093568]here[/url] verifies that you can kill your teammate to loot their gear if they disconnect. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.pcgamer.com/playerunknowns-battlegrounds-player-banned-for-team-killing-a-team-killer/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[align=center]Gaming Video of the Week[sp]

[yt]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CSYUQDRTQ6s[/yt][/sp][/align]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/ctcHVCW.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Feds Seize Alpha-Bay and Hansa Markets[/color][/b] 
Europol has seized two popular dark web market websites known as Alpha-Bay and Hansa with the help of the FBI, DEA, and the Dutch National Police. In its prime, Alpha-Bay was the dark nets one of the most famous criminal marketplaces with a huge member base. Europol report that the two websites alone are responsible for the sales of over 350,000 illegal sales of guns, drugs, and even malware. Starting with Hanza, the website was seized first and was being controlled by the Dutch National Police since June 20. Prior to the seize message, the Dutch National Police were setting up a new code for the website that would monitor the incoming traffic, such as IP addresses and even Bitcoin addresses. Next, the Alpha-Bay website went down suddenly without administrators notice on July 4. People who frequently used the website were unaware of the situation and had no idea that the website was even being seized. A suspected admin was caught and found. Alexandre Cazes, 26, was a Canadian citizen waiting to be extradited to the U.S. for the crimes he committed when he was later found in his cell hanging from the ceiling. At the current time, the feds are monitoring activity to the website as said before and action is being taken if necessary. [i][size=x-small][url=http://thehackernews.com/2017/07/#-hansa-darkweb-markets-seized.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Briar Darknet Messenger Released[/color][/b] 
If you are looking for a way to communicate with others securely, this new app may interest you. Whether it be for malicious purposes or just to text that beautiful significant other those lewd pictures, Briar is here for you. What makes this app unique is the fact that it uses peer-to-peer network instead of a central server that an application like Twitter and Telegram use. With Briar, you have the ability to synchronize via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi. This allows you to stay connected with your friends even when your internet is offline. However, if you have an internet connection, you can actually connect to the Tor network adding an extra layer of protection to your chats. Some messaging apps require or ask if you would like to import your contact lists. To stick to their word of anonymity, this application does not prompt that message at all.  There is one problem, though, if you are using this for malicious purposes. Well, if you are in different countries that is. In order to create a contact, you must come face-to-face with the user and scan a QR code. This QR code verifies that the user you are talking to is actually that person. So when scanning these codes, you know face-to-face this is Billy Bob from Ohio and not Billy Joe from Maine. [i][size=x-small][url=https://latesthackingnews.com/2017/07/22/briar-darknet-messenger-tor-based-has-been-released/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Critical Code Injection Flaw in Gnome File Manager[/color][/b] 
A German security researcher by the name of Nils Dagsson Moskopp recently found a vulnerability in the GNOME Files file manager. Given the nickname "Bad Taste", but properly known as CVE-2017-11421, the vulnerability can be executed in the thumbnail handler. Fun-fact, gnome-exe-thumbnailer is actually managed by a third-party website and has was not developed by the GNOME team. To break down how the code is injected, gnome-exe-thumbnailer handles the thumbnails generated when converting Windows programs (stuff like .exe) to be used on GNOME computers by the use of an application known as Wine. Wine is a program that can be used on Linux and OSX to allow the use of Windows application on the non-windows devices. Moskopp has discovered that when the Wine application generates the thumbnail after converting said application, it runs a code that will execute what the thumbnail would look like. If you were to download a malicious program that was aimed for a Windows computer, used Wine to convert it, then open it in your Linux device the file will still be infected on your Linux device. Thus, allowing the hacker to compromise your computer. Moskopp has mentioned to keep yourself safe from the code injection flaw you must,
[list]
[*]Delete all files in /usr/share/thumbnailers.
[*]Do not use GNOME Files.
[*]Uninstall any software that facilitates automatically execution of filenames as code.[/list]

It should also be known that if you run Linux with GNOME, that any version before 0.9.5 version is affected. [i][size=x-small][url=http://thehackernews.com/2017/07/linux-gnome-vulnerability.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color][/size][/font]

[font=Trebuchet MS][size=1][color=transparent]       [/color]
